description: This PHP source file renders a web page for managing cordless handsets, including listing registered devices, their statuses, and providing functionality for registration, deregistration, and configuration of handsets and related settings.

methods.name: init_data
methods.description: Initializes handset data, populates table with registered handsets, and sets up UI interactions

methods.name: ajax_do
methods.description: Performs AJAX request to update handset settings based on user actions
